other_tests.findings: Slowing of the background rhythm, without evidence of seizure activity during an episode.

findings.description: Pontomedullary hypoplasia, diminutive corpus callosum, reduced white matter volume, and hyperintense signal abnormality consistent with hypomyelination.

other_tests.changes_over_time: At 18-month follow-up, MRI revealed increased myelination but still had deficiency of the corpus callosum.

other_tests.findings: Cerebrospinal fluid analysis results were consistent with normal parameters.
